source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 677,141 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 296,620.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 79 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 373 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 61,704 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 140,244.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 71,733 Nature damage over 8 sec.

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.

name: Frontman's Wondrous Wall
description: It's gonna be the one that saves you.

spells.description: Use: Teleports the caster to the Argent Tournament Grounds. (30 Min Cooldown)
